name: o lukin e ko jaki
description:
musi ni la ko jaki mute li tawa lon ma. sina wile kama sona e kule pi ko jaki e nasin pi ko jaki. sina wile awen e sona ni li toki e sona sina. sina toki e sona ike la musi li pini.

------

kepeken toki ike Inli la:

Memorize the color and trajectory of sliding poops. Answer what you remember in a language that you don't understand. Answer it wrong and you lose the game.
Language: Toki Pona with in-game English-Toki Pona dictionary.
